divs: Sighting Detailsthey looked like stars playing with each other. they would fly in and out of the clouds. they would fly and hit each other and the lights would split in a few seconeds they would get back together. they then started to play again. about a half hour went by then out of the clouds a big triangle came out then a miniut later a bigger dimoned shapped one came out of another cloud with a center red green blue strobbing light. the truck we were driving stopped running for some resone. would not re start.about ten miniuts later they all flew back into the clouds. two mins later two fighter jets were flying back and forth around the area we saw the lights. this went on for ten fifteen mins or so. about four hours later the truck started back up and we drove off. this seems to be an area where of people are always seeing these lights but no one ever says a thing about it. i belive they dont want to be seen as wierd people or crazy.. Paul
Summary: like they were playing with each other.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Claypool
This sighting has never been favorited.
